title: Identifying speech disorders: language (TEFC)
creator_credit: Glen Howard, James Craig and Bay State Film Productions
brief_description: One of a series of films which portrays a type of deviant communication. It is limited to a descriptive presentation of language disorders which allow the individual instructor to discuss cause, treatment, prognosis etc., according to his own perspective.
creator_credit_for_label: Glen Howard, James Craig and Bay State Film Productions
